description: Session Complete: TOON Tabular Encoding for trace_call_path + get_symbols with Gemini Validation. Fixed both tools to use true tabular TOON format (not YAML fallback) by removing #[serde(skip_serializing_if)] and creating ToonFlat* structs with uniform keys. Results: trace_call_path 43.1% savings (19,170 → 10,900 chars), get_symbols 50.0% savings (6,586 → 3,297 chars). Comprehensive review completed: 0 TODO comments, 0 build warnings, 1,853 tests passing. Gemini validation confirmed correctness - no critical issues, only minor optimization suggestions. All tools now using optimal TOON encoding. Production ready!
